content: How many miles does light travel in one hour?

Light travels at approximately 186,282 miles per second. There are 3,600 seconds in an hour (60 seconds per minute times 60 minutes). So, to find out how many miles light travels in one hour, you would multiply the speed of light by the number of seconds in an hour:

186,282 miles/second * 3,600 seconds/hour = 670,615,200 miles/hour

So, light travels about 670,615,200 miles in one hour.
